translations: 同情的，怜悯的（常带优越感）
同情，怜悯（pity 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: She gave him a pitying look; that was the sort of excuse her father would use.
sentences.translation: 她怜悯地看了他一眼，这类借口是她父亲会用的。

sentences.sentence: Dickon followed her with a queer, almost pitying, look on his face.
sentences.translation: 狄肯跟在她身后，脸上带着一种近乎怜悯的古怪表情。

sentences.sentence: This kind-hearted girl, pitying the misery of Toad, said to her father one day, "Father!"
sentences.translation: 有一天，这个善良的姑娘为托德的不幸遭遇感到同情，对她的父亲说：“父亲！”
